long_description: A dapper look for men or women, the Sunday Afternoons Havana Hat sports a classic style as well as excellent sun protection. Constructed from a tough paper weave with a stylish headband. UPF 50+ rating and 2.75 in. brim keep harmful UV rays at bay. Crushable for day use; however, it's best not to keep hat crushed for long periods of time. Internal sweatband helps keep moisture off your brow. Can be spot cleaned and line dried; avoid wearing the Sunday Afternoons Havana Hat in wet weather. Closeout.
short_description: A dapper look for men or women, the Sunday Afternoons Havana Hat sports a classic style as well as excellent sun protection.
